results.description: Gerard Deulofeu's goal after 76 seconds sets Watford on their way to a first Premier League win of the season.
results.shortTitle: Watford off bottom with first league win
results.title: Norwich City 0-2 Watford: Hornets' first win of season lifts them off bottom

results.description: Norwich head coach Daniel Farke says his side's 2-0 loss at home to Watford was a "disaster" after conceding the first goal in the second minute.
results.shortTitle: Watford defeat a 'disaster' says Farke
results.title: Norwich 0-2 Watford: Farke calls Hornets defeat a 'disaster'

results.description: Head coach Quique Sanchez Flores praises the strength of his 10-man Watford side after they beat Norwich 2-0 to secure their first Premier League win of the season.
results.shortTitle: Watford players 'really strong' today - Flores
results.title: Norwich 0-2 Watford: Hornets strength pleases Flores

results.description: Mark Lawrenson takes on 'The Irishman' star Stephen Graham to make predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

results.description: Racist abuse must be tackled with a "one-strike" policy rather than Uefa's existing three-step protocol, says Watford captain Troy Deeney.
results.shortTitle: 'One-strike policy needed for racism'
results.title: Racism in football: Watford's Troy Deeney says 'one-strike' policy needed

results.description: Chelsea manager Frank Lampard is "surprised" with the VAR decision to award Watford a penalty against his side, following the Blues' 2-1 win at Watford.
results.shortTitle: We're in a difficult place with VAR - Lampard
results.title: Watford 1-2 Chelsea: We're in a 'difficult' place with VAR - Frank Lampard

results.description: Watford manager Quique Sanchez Flores says his side need to treat every game as a "final", following the Hornets' 2-1 defeat by Chelsea at Vicarage Road.
results.shortTitle: Every game a final for Hornets - Flores
results.title: Watford 1-2 Chelsea: Quique Sanchez Flores says Watford must treat every game as a 'final'

results.description: Goakeeper Ben Foster is denied a stunning stoppage-time equaliser as Chelsea hung on to victory at Watford to move into third in the Premier League.

results.title: Watford 1-2 Chelsea: Tammy Abraham & Christian Pulisic goals send Blues third

results.description: Watford striker Andre Gray says the "building block" to stopping discrimination is clubs dealing "with their own community".

results.description: Watford's young striker Joao Pedro has been granted a work permit - 12 months after signing for the club.
